Idaho Falls Restaurant Coupons&Deals
United States > Idaho > Idaho Falls Idaho Falls Restaurant Guide&Dining Reviews
Featured Review Fiesta Ole' food is some of the best around, the shredded beef chimi diner is to die for. the soft flour tacos with sour cream + hotsauce = orgasm. the crisp bean burritos kick butt as well
Check out the Best Idaho Falls Restaurant Deals .
Recent Idaho Falls Restaurant Guide Reviews
China Super Buffet “Tried it out and loved the new changes they did to the foods! There seemed to be more varieties and i love the grill too!”
Johnny Carino's Italian Restaurant “Great place to eat and have fun with family and friends. The food is awesome!”
Fiesta Ole' “I LOVE this place! I live in Florida but have family in Idaho so I am always excited to eat here over Christmas vaca. I love their hot sauce so much that I have family ship me bottles of it (how awesome is it that t...”
Franks Place “Terrible customer service. NOT a sports bar. I called in to ask what was showing that night and was hung up on by the woman on the phone.”
Hardy's Pub&Grill “Great food, cold beer, lots of fun.”
Quizno's Classic Subs “Food is fast and friendly. I love that place!”
Fiesta Ole' “The food is good, especially the 'Crisp Bean Burritos'... We eat there every time we go to Idaho to see my wifes' family. For the idiot from Seatle, 'Chile Verde' means "Chile Green" (or green sauce if you prefer)...”
Hong Kong Restaurant “I concur with the previous reviewer who noted that Hong Kong Restaurant has very good Chinese food. It's also a very good value. I got a meal to go at 9:45 PM on a Friday night with Sweet&Sour Pork, Pork Chow Mein...”
Happy's Chinese Restaurant “Happy's is a great place to eat. The food is very good and while they don't look over your shoulder you are not neglected. Everything is fresh and well prepared. I am always confident of having a good dining exper...”
Fiesta Ole' “TOOK FAMILY TO DINER AND THE FAMILIY MEALS ARE THE BEST AND QUITE AFFORDABLE, THE STORE WAS CLEAN AND THE FOOD WAS HOT AND THE CREW WAS FRIENDLY, WOULD RECCOMEND THIS PLACE”
Pockets Inc “the staff are fun and freindly”
Fiesta Ole' “Absolutely horrible. The sauce bar looked as if it hadn't been cleaned for a good while. The pico de gallo had a funky color to it.
I ordered the "Chili Verde" and it literally was just sauce. No pork whatsoev...”
Mama Inez Mexican Cuisine “love the chow babay!!!!!!”
Mama Inez Mexican Cuisine “Used to be my favorite. Loved their Seafood Chimichanga. But it has changed under the new management. Really a disappointment now.”
Wrangler Roast Beef “I find the food her very good and the price is write. Fish&Chips are the best!”
Mama Inez Mexican Cuisine “Standard chain restaurant food. Not bad, but not great either. I have had better elsewhere in Idaho Falls. Server was excellant, really knew his business.”
Hong Kong Restaurant “It is some of the best Chinese in Idaho Falls. There Lunch Speshel is a good value and is good to.” » Read More: Idaho Falls Restaurant Reviews
